.table mother
----
{
  "nextNodeID": 1,
  "nodes": {
    "0": {
      "node": {
        "type": "BaseFactTable"
      },
      "cache": []
    }
  },
  "edges": {},
  "relationRefs": {
    "mother": "0"
  }
}

.table father
----
{
  "nextNodeID": 2,
  "nodes": {
    "0": {
      "node": {
        "type": "BaseFactTable"
      },
      "cache": []
    },
    "1": {
      "node": {
        "type": "BaseFactTable"
      },
      "cache": []
    }
  },
  "edges": {},
  "relationRefs": {
    "mother": "0",
    "father": "1"
  }
}

matGramp{child: A, grandfather: C} :-
  mother{child: A, mother: B} & father{child: B, father: C}.
----
{
  "nextNodeID": 4,
  "nodes": {
    "0": {
      "node": {
        "type": "BaseFactTable"
      },
      "cache": []
    },
    "1": {
      "node": {
        "type": "BaseFactTable"
      },
      "cache": []
    },
    "2": {
      "node": {
        "type": "Union"
      },
      "cache": []
    },
    "3": {
      "node": {
        "type": "Join",
        "leftAttr": "foo",
        "rightAttr": "bar"
      },
      "cache": []
    }
  },
  "edges": {
    "0": [
      "3"
    ],
    "1": [
      "3"
    ],
    "3": [
      "2"
    ]
  },
  "relationRefs": {
    "mother": "0",
    "father": "1",
    "matGramp": "2"
  }
}
